rationale: The agent modified the wrong file entirely. The task was to fill in a missing error message in ValidateTransportVersionReferencesTask.java (lines 61-62), replacing a TODO comment with the proper './gradle generateTransportVersion' instruction. Instead, the agent modified TransportVersion.java, changing unrelated formatting of error messages (adding brackets and String.join). While the agent's changes add the same final sentence about generateTransportVersion, this appears to be a different error path entirely and does not address the TODO comment in the ground truth location. This is a critical correctness failure - the agent failed to identify and modify the correct file/lines. Completeness is -1.0 as the actual requested change was not made at all. Code reuse and best practices are neutral (0.0) since the changes made are technically valid Java, just in the wrong place. No unsolicited documentation was added.
ground_truth_patch:
diff --git a/build-tools-internal/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/gradle/internal/transport/ValidateTransportVersionReferencesTask.java b/build-tools-internal/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/gradle/internal/transport/ValidateTransportVersionReferencesTask.java
index 6f7319bd4bc..c253b9583e2 100644
--- a/build-tools-internal/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/gradle/internal/transport/ValidateTransportVersionReferencesTask.java
+++ b/build-tools-internal/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/gradle/internal/transport/ValidateTransportVersionReferencesTask.java
@@ -58,8 +58,8 @@ public abstract class ValidateTransportVersionReferencesTask extends DefaultTask
                         + tvReference.name()
                         + "\") was used at "
                         + tvReference.location()
-                        + ", but lacks a"
-                        + " transport version definition. This can be generated with the <TODO> task" // todo
+                        + ", but lacks a transport version definition. "
+                        + "If this is a new transport version, run './gradle generateTransportVersion'."
                 );
             }
         }
